alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 7:43PM MDT until June 14 at 1:05PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Nepesta, Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Nepesta. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, Minor Flood. Agricultural lands near Nepesta are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 16.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 05/21/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM MDT.
